title: Ep 73: A Minute to Obsess with Actress Molly Ringwald
itunes:title: Ep 73: A Minute to Obsess with Actress Molly Ringwald
itunes:subtitle: Molly Ringwald, original Cool Teen/film icon talks to us about red hair, Riverdale, and what it means to feel pretty. Before that: Allure magazine bans "anti-aging" from its lexicon; Pat McGrath debuts her biggest collection ever; and the wei...
description:
Molly Ringwald, original Cool Teen/film icon talks to us about red hair, Riverdale, and what it means to feel pretty. Before that: Allure magazine bans "anti-aging" from its lexicon; Pat McGrath debuts her biggest collection ever; and the weird reasons your hair keeps breaking.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
